WorkItem.Description:
Previously, with a new release of Rawr, I would disable the default 'Epic' gemming templates and create a single, custom blank gemming template.  Having done so, this selection would hold true until the next upgrade.
Â 
When I do this now, however, each time I launch Rawr, it reverts to the original configuration and has no recollection of the blank template I created.  This appears to be true across all classes (and doesn't seem like something that would be module-specific, in any case).  Perhaps a config file isn't being properly written?
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Selected/custom Gemming Templates not being saved across sessions

Comments.Message: This happens in 2.3.15 also, if you create any custom gemming template onat least 4 models that I know of; Warrior Fury/Tank, Druid Tree/Moonkin, Pally Retro/Holy, and Hunter. I'm not a big raider and have limited funds so I currently stick with rares, but I have to deselect the epic templates each and every time I load any of my toons.
Ooops I apologize. Yes this was happening to me also with 2.3.14 but each toon model I listed DOES NOT reselect epics on reloading saved toon. Sorry about that.
Can you clarify if this is still an issue for you and if so explain exactly what the issue is and how to reproduce it.
